name: Vegan Coconut Paletas
description: These vegan coconut paletas (paletas de coco) are super easy to make and have only 3 ingredients. They are creamy, without being too rich, and full of toasted coconut flakes.

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the coconut milk and sugar in a medium sauce pot and bring to a simmer.
recipeInstructions.name: Combine the coconut milk and sugar in a medium sauce pot and bring to a simmer.

recipeInstructions.text: Turn heat off and let cool in fridge. Once completely cool, strain.
recipeInstructions.name: Turn heat off and let cool in fridge. Once completely cool, strain.

recipeInstructions.text: Add coconut and mix well. Pour into popsicle molds and freeze for 5 hours
recipeInstructions.name: Add coconut and mix well. Pour into popsicle molds and freeze for 5 hours

keywords: coconut paletas, homemade paletas, vegan coconut paletas, vegan paletas
